title: RAAF Base Butterworth
creator_credit: Harry Rayner and Australia. Royal Australian Air Force
brief_description: Life on the RAAF base at Butterworth, Malaya. British, Australian and Malayan personnel; relationships with the local people; provision for family life and recreation; the wives and children and airmen; servicing and flying aircraft; training exercises; practice with the one-man dinghy; the airmen as ambassadors.
